main event: An observer reported seeing a bright round object traveling at high speed in Suffield, Ohio on December 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object emitted a 'beep' sound while flashing lights were visible., The observer clearly described the object as round in shape., This observation was part of a report submitted to the Air Force., The investigation concluded that there was insufficient data for a scientific evaluation., A sketch of the object was included in the report.
witness description: An observer who reported the sighting to the Air Force.
